data.title: Do you know what languages Queen Sofia and King Juan Carlos speak? Besides Spanish and Greek (for Sofia)... – @spanish
data.meta_description:
Do you know what languages Queen Sofia and King Juan Carlos speak? Besides Spanish and Greek (for Sofia)...

Hey, sorry it took so long for me to answer this. Queen Sofia speaks Greek as a first lang…
data.text: Hey, sorry it took so long for me to answer this. Queen Sofia speaks Greek as a first language, and also english (it was the language she used to comunicate with her parents). She also speaks german (her mother was from Germany and she also spent time in a boarding school in that country). Finally, when she married Juan Carlos and moved to Spain, she learned spanish. She once said she has an accent in every language except for greek which she says she has forgotten a lot of it due to lack of practice since she moved to spain. Truth is, she has a great spanish and greek (once when she came back to Greece she was heard speaking the language perfectly with other locals), her english has an accent but I think is amazing too. Idk how good her german is though. Here’s a video of her speaking english and spanish.
